TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputCacheProfile extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class OutputCacheProfile Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 設定可由應用程式頁面使用的輸出快取設定檔。

span.span: Configures the output cache profile that can be used by the application pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一個方式來以程式設計方式存取和修改`add`項目`outputCacheProfiles`一節中`caching`組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `add` element of the `outputCacheProfiles` section in the `caching` section of a configuration file. 物件集中經常使用的組態設定，例如相依性、 快取位置和快取到期時間，而不必在每個頁面上指定它們。The object centralizes frequently used configuration settings such as dependencies, cache location, and cache expiration time, eliminating the need to specify them on every page. 可以套用至頁面上，使用`CacheProfile`指示詞的屬性。The can be applied to a page using the `CacheProfile` attribute of the directive. > [!NOTE] > 指示詞可以覆寫所包含的所有設定物件除了屬性。The directive can override all the settings contained by an object except for the attribute. 這是啟用或停用而不需要修改可能會變更已覆寫它的所有頁面中的指示詞。This is to enable or disable the without having to modify the directives in all the pages that might have overridden it. 類別負責監視相依性，以確保任何快取項目變更時，會自動移除快取的項目。The class monitors the dependencies so that when any cached item changes, the cached item will be automatically removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合來存取其物件。The following code example shows how to use the collection to access its objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Duration { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Duration : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定快取頁面或控制項的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the time duration during which the page or control is cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表時間 （秒） 快取的頁面或使用者控制項。The represents the time in seconds that the page or user control is cached. 設定這個屬性會建立從頁面或控制項的方法，它可以套用，並會自動導致快取其輸出的 HTTP 回應的到期原則。Setting this property establishes an expiration policy for HTTP responses from the page or control to which it applies and will automatically cause the caching of their output. > [!NOTE] > 必須定義在設定檔或使用設定檔頁面的指示詞。The must be defined in either the profile or the directive of a page using the profile. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定指示是否啟用快取的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether caching is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用快取，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓啟用或停用在同一個地方只快取的機制。The property allows enabling or disabling the caching mechanism in one place only. 它會影響所有的頁面或使用此控制項。It affects all the pages or controls that use this . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#12)]

member this.Location : System.Web.UI.OutputCacheLocation with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定輸出快取的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the output cache location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設為`Any`，輸出快取可以位於瀏覽器用戶端，要求的起源; 在 proxy 伺服器或任何其他伺服器，參與要求; 或在處理要求的伺服器上。If is set to `Any`, the output cache can be located on the browser client, where the request originated; on a proxy server, or any other server, participating in the request; or on the server where the request was processed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#5)]

member this.Name : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用將值指派給`CacheProfile`指示詞，如果您想要套用屬性到頁面或控制項的值。You use the to assign a value to the `CacheProfile` attribute of the directive if you want to apply the values to a page or control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用次要儲存區。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether secondary storage is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用次要儲存區，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if secondary storage is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面，其中包含屬性設定為`true`問題以防止機密資訊的次要儲存體標頭中指定的回應。The page that has the property set to `true` issues a response specifying in its header to prevent secondary storage of sensitive information. 將此屬性設定為`true`相當於叫用Web 要求期間的方法。Setting this attribute to `true` is equivalent to invoking the method during a Web request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#4)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SqlDependency { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SqlDependency : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義 Web 應用程式與 SQL Server，在伺服器上的資料中允許的變更偵測的執行個體之間的關聯性。The defines a relationship between a Web application and an instance of SQL Server, allowing the detection of changes in the data at the server. 可確保每當 SQL 資料表上所相依的將會移除從快取的快取的頁面輸出變更。The ensures that output cached pages are removed from the cache whenever the SQL table on which they depend changes. > [!NOTE] > 類別負責監視資料表，以確保當資料表變更時，將從快取會自動移除項目。The class monitors the table so that when the table changes, the item will be automatically removed from the Cache. 此類別無法被繼承。This class cannot be inherited. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByContentEncoding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByContentEncoding : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定一組要快取的內容編碼方式，並以分號來區隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the semicolon-delimited set of content encodings to be cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定為所使用的相同`VaryByContentEncoding`指示詞的屬性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByContentEncoding` attribute of the directive. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByControl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByControl : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以分號分隔的一組要快取控制項的 Id。The is a semicolon-delimited set of IDs of controls to be cached. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 快取多個版本的使用者控制項輸出](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad)。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of User Control Output](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad). > [!NOTE] > 設定為所使用的相同`VaryByControls`指示詞的屬性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByControls` attribute of the directive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByCustom { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByCustom : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是任何文字，表示自訂輸出快取的需求。The can be any text that represents custom output-caching requirements. 如果輸入的自訂字串，則您必須覆寫應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中的方法。If a custom string is entered, you must override the method in the application's Global.asax file. > [!NOTE] > 設定為所使用的相同`VaryByCustom`指示詞的屬性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByCustom` attribute of the directive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByHeader { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByHeader : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以分號分隔的一組用來區分快取的輸出標頭。The is a semicolon-delimited set of headers used to vary the cached output. 這些是與要求相關聯的 HTTP 標頭。These are HTTP headers associated with the request. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 快取的頁面上的多個版本](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c60284a9-9899-4fdc-a97c-020766b7572e)。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of a Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c60284a9-9899-4fdc-a97c-020766b7572e). > [!NOTE] > 設定為所使用的相同`VaryByHeader`屬性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByHeader` attribute of the . 更改所有標頭的值"\*"不建議使用。Varying by all headers by setting the value of "\*" is not recommended. 它可能會導致快取溢位或阻斷服務攻擊的 Web 伺服器上。It can result in cache overflow or a denial of service attack on the Web server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#2)]

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByParam { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByParam : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以分號分隔的一組用來區分快取的輸出參數。The is a semicolon-delimited set of parameters used to vary the cached output. 它可讓不同的快取的輸出，get 查詢字串或表單 POST 參數。It allows varying the cached output by GET query string or form POST parameters. 比方說，您可以藉由指定使用者控制項的名稱，以及查詢字串或表單張貼參數來變更使用者控制項輸出快取。For instance, you can vary the user-control output to the cache by specifying the user-control name along with either a query string or a form POST parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 快取多個版本的使用者控制項輸出](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad)。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of User Control Output](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad). 設定必須定義在設定檔或使用設定檔的頁面指示詞。The setting must be defined in either the profile or the directive of the page using the profile. > [!NOTE] > 設定為所使用的相同`VaryByParam`屬性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByParam` attribute of the . 更改所有參數的值"\*"不建議使用。Varying by all parameters by setting the value of "\*" is not recommended. 它可能會導致快取溢位或阻斷服務攻擊的 Web 伺服器上。It can result in cache overflow or a denial of service attack on the Web server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#8)]
